=Using WINDWare=

We have extend fosstrak server and TDT engine to support passive sensor enabled RFID tags.

To build WINDWare please follow the instructions on how dependencies on [https://code.google.com/p/fosstrak/wiki/AleDevGuideHowToBuild fosstrak How to Buld page].

Checkout modified TDT engine from [https://windware.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/tdt/ tdt] directory.
Using install the modified TDT engine in the local maven repository.

{{{
mvn clean install
}}}


Then checkout the source in the [https://windware.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/windware/ windware] directory.
Then run the maven package goal to build the deployable applications. 
{{{
mvn clean package
}}}
